document_data.mainbody:
keshia was an elven noblewoman and philanthropist from the ancient Myth Drannor.
Ikeshia, who was known by her family name only, died long before the advent of the Weeping War of 711-714 DR which destroyed the great City of Song. She was interred in the Ikeshias Crypt, at the heart of Polyandrium, one of the burial sights of Myth Drannor on the outskirts of the city. Her final resting place was desecrated by the Cult of the Dragon in 1369 DR.
